prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc â€” Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Floor framing plan for new ADU above existing garage showing joist layout (2x14 @ 16" O.C., 2x12 @ 16" O.C.), rafter framing (2x6 @ 24" O.C.), floor sheathing specs, roof sheathing specs, strap schedule with 7 strap types and holdown connections, wall stud framing, and plan notes. Scale 1/4" = 1'-0".
key_content: Floor framing plan at 1/4" = 1'-0" scale
Floor joists: 2x14 @ 16" O.C. (primary), 2x12 @ 16" O.C. (secondary)
Rafters: 2x6 @ 24" O.C.
Wall stud framing: 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C. typical
Floor sheathing: 3/4" APA-RATED STR.C, T&G, nailing at 16" O.C.
Roof sheathing: 1/2" APA RATED EXP.1 (32/16) w/ clips, no blocking required if staggered
Field nailing: F.N. = 10d @ 12"
3 x 5.5 PSL header at shaped hip/valley area
Strap schedule: STRAP1 (CS16, 9", 1,371 lbs, HDU2), STRAP2 (CS16, 11", 1,701 lbs, HDU2)
Strap schedule: STRAP3 (2-CS16, 9", 2,742 lbs, HDU4), STRAP4 (2-CS16, 11", 3,412 lbs, HDU5)
Strap schedule: STRAP5 (CMSTC16, 20", 4,683 lbs, HDU5), STRAP6 (CMST14, 28", 6,474 lbs, HDU8)
Strap schedule: STRAP7 (CMST12, 33", 9,228 lbs, HDU11)
Holdown sizes at foundation: HDU2, HDU4, HDU5, HDU8, HDU11
Strap models: CS16, 2-CS16, CMSTC16, CMST14, CMST12 (Simpson)
Shearwalls per schedule on S2.0, start at foundation and continue to roof level
Required top plate splice per schedule on 2/S3.2
Headers installed per detail 3/S3.2
Framing members hung per detail 12/S3.2
Ceiling joist per detail 6/S3.2
All exposed wood: treated, redwood, or cedar; connectors galvanized G185
11 plan notes referencing S1.0 structural notes and S3.0-S3.1 details
APPROVED by Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: blocking requirements at perpendicular and parallel to joists (beyond sheathing note)
NOT SHOWN: DTC clip specs and spacing

drawing_zones.content: Legend (joist, rafter, ceiling joist, header, post, strap, shearwall, top plate splice symbols)
Floor Framing Plan drawing (joists, rafters, straps, sheathing, posts)
Strap Schedule (7 strap types: STRAP1-STRAP7 with models, capacities, holdown sizes)
Floor Framing Plan title with scale 1/4" = 1'-0"
Title block: S2.1 Floor Framing Plan, Ramirez Structural Inc, Project 25-357
